'''Chilled Meat''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] item used in recipes to create [[Food]] items.

==How to Obtain==
Chilled Meat is dropped by [[Snowboar]]s and [[The Great Snowboar King]] of [[Dragonspine]]. Snowboars are found encased in ice, mostly near the Snowboar King's lair and Dragonspine's coastline, and require applying {{Pyro}} to free them before they can be hit to obtain Chilled Meat.

See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=153 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
